childMarkdownRemark.html:
Where are we:

At the moment, there is a team formed for distribution in Karachi. We are brainstorming on how to shortlist needy. There are several channels available for that (example being: Indus Hospital; the Citizens Foundation; food delivery riders (thousands have gone jobless … just like that) & more

internal.content:
Where are we:

At the moment, there is a team formed for distribution in Karachi.
We are brainstorming on how to shortlist needy. There are several channels available for that (example being: Indus Hospital; the Citizens Foundation; food delivery riders (thousands have gone jobless ... just like that) & more

childMarkdownRemark.html: We discussed our plan for procurement of ration packs, distribution strategy, selection criteria for families to helped and what to include in the ration pack.

internal.content: We discussed our plan for procurement of ration packs, distribution strategy, selection criteria for families to helped and what to include in the ration pack.

childMarkdownRemark.html: We are settling with below contents. It may change by the time we place next order, since contents are subject to availability at the time of order:

internal.content: We are settling with below contents. It may change by the time we place next order, since contents are subject to availability at the time of order:

childProjectsList.title: We have funds for 350 ration packs

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Alhamdolillah what an amazing group. Generated enough to secure 350 ration packs, mostly from sadaqah and some zakaat, subhanAllah.

Sent some of it to start procuring ration items. Due to demand prices may change or some items may be replaced with others, due to non-availability.

internal.content:
Alhamdolillah what an amazing group. Generated enough to secure 350 ration packs, mostly from sadaqah and some zakaat, subhanAllah.

Sent some of it to start procuring ration items. Due to demand prices may change or some items may be replaced with others, due to non-availability.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
100 packs to be distributed tomorrow InShaAllah.

Recipients to be called all throughout the day in small batches of 10 or so to avoid crowding.

Trusted people have a list of most needy, less needy and least needy. We are going by the most needy since need is more and availability is limited (350 packs).

After this round, if we see success out of it, we will try to continue this cycle (subject to conditions being conducive), and those that can afford to do it, can chip in again or reach out to their friends and families to participate.

Zakaat will be accepted in the next round too in sha Allah.

Chosen few will be asked to come pick up their share. We will not be distributing in the open. Too risky to do that as volunteers will easily get mobbed in no time.

internal.content:
100 packs to be distributed tomorrow InShaAllah.

Recipients to be called all throughout the day in small batches of 10 or so to avoid crowding.

Trusted people have a list of most needy, less needy and least needy. We are going by the most needy since need is more and availability is limited (350 packs).


After this round, if we see success out of it, we will try to continue this cycle (subject to conditions being conducive), and those that can afford to do it, can chip in again or reach out to their friends and families to participate. 

Zakaat will be accepted in the next round too in sha Allah.

Chosen few will be asked to come pick up their share. We will not be distributing in the open. Too risky to do that as volunteers will easily get mobbed in no time.

childProjectsList.title: Ration Distribution in Gulistan e Johar, Karachi

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Distribution today, 3pm PST onwards at a local jaamiah.

They have spaced it out and are calling about 6 or 7 people at a time to maintain social distancing and avoid crowds.

200 ration packs distributed there الحمد للہ

internal.content:
Distribution today, 3pm  PST onwards at a local jaamiah.

They have spaced it out and are calling about 6 or 7 people at a time to maintain social distancing and avoid crowds.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Details of beneficiaries are captured. Masking personal information here, but all details are available

internal.content: Details of beneficiaries are captured. Masking personal information here, but all details are available

childProjectsList.title: Ground Reality - Police called to disperse mob

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yesterday again we just ran into a mob. When our purchase manager Rafiq bhai reached the truck it was Maghrib time and he had to wait for pick up. Waiting those few minutes outside, a crowd gathered and followed the team up to the gates. Team was able to enter the Madrassa (our point of distribution), but the crowd outside grew, becoming violent. Police had to be called to disperse them.

internal.content:
Yesterday again we just ran into a mob.
When our purchase manager Rafiq bhai reached the truck it was Maghrib time and he had to wait for pick up. 
Waiting those few minutes outside, a crowd gathered and followed the team up to the gates.
Team was able to enter the Madrassa (our point of distribution), but the crowd outside grew, becoming violent.
Police had to be called to disperse them.

childProjectsList.title: Preperations for Distribution from Jamia Suffah Baldia

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Another batch of distribution out of Jamia Suffah, Baldia, Karachi, Pakistan.

250 packs were distributed there Alhamdolillah.

Crowds were lined up outside to keep distribution manageable.

Women lined up from a seperate entrance
